name: Tricorn the Cacophonous Concert
effectText: If a monster(s) in your possession is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 monster in your GY with both the same Type and Attribute as a monster you control; add that monster to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Tricorn the Cacophonous Concert" once per turn.
